Name: baseline_comparison
Title: Comparative Analysis of Model Performance on Simple Tasks
Experiment:
Implement a basic experiment comparing model performance on a simple classification task. The experiment should:
1. Train models of different architectures (MLP, CNN) on MNIST
2. Compare training speed and final accuracy
3. Analyze the effect of model size on performance

Name: optimization_study
Title: Impact of Optimization Strategies on Model Convergence
Experiment:
Study how different optimization strategies affect model training:
1. Compare SGD, Adam, and RMSprop optimizers
2. Analyze learning rate schedules (constant, step, cosine)
3. Measure convergence speed and final performance
